name: Research doctorate recipients, by detailed field of doctorate, citizenship status, ethnicity, and race: 2021
description: Research doctorate recipients, by detailed field of doctorate, citizenship status, ethnicity, and race: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizens_and_permanent_residents_total
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizens And Permanent Residents Total

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizens_and_permanent_residents_hispanic_or_latino
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizens And Permanent Residents Hispanic Or Latino

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizens_and_permanent_residents_not_hispanic_or_latino_american_indian_or_alaska_native
variableMeasured.description: U S Citizens And Permanent Residents Not Hispanic Or Latino American Indian Or Alaska Native

variableMeasured.description: U S Citizens And Permanent Residents Not Hispanic Or Latino Black Or African American

variableMeasured.name: field_u_s_citizens_and_permanent_residents_not_hispanic_or_latino_other_race_or_race_not_reported

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Beginning in 2021, a modified version of the 2020 Classification of Instructional Programs (CIP) codes was used in the survey data collection, and the new broad, major, and detailed fields were used in tables reporting only the most recent data year. Therefore, the field of doctorate data in 2021 may not be comparable to prior years; see the "Technical Notes" for more information, table A-4 for a summary of SED-CIP codes in the new SED field taxonomy, table A-5 for a full list of SED-CIP code in the new field taxonomy, and table A-6 for the SED-CIP code crosswalk to the historical field taxonomy.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
